dcterms:description: The EEGEyeNet dataset includes synchronized EEG and eye-tracking data, collected using a high-density, 128-channel EEG system and an infrared video-based eye tracker. It contains two parts: the Position Task, which estimates absolute gaze position during fixation, and the Direction Task, which estimates relative changes during saccades, including amplitude and angle predictions.
dcterms:title: EEGEyeNet Dataset
